item.title: Marketing Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
I am  seeking a highly organized and experienced Marketing Assistant to join my team.
As a Relationship Therapist, I require someone who can assist with managing and growing my Instagram presence.
The ideal candidate will be creative, detail-oriented, and proficient in various aspects of social media marketing, with a particular focus on Instagram.

Key Responsibilities
Instagram Management
- Create, schedule, and post engaging content on Instagram.
- Respond to comments and direct messages promptly and professionally.
- Monitor Instagram analytics and provide regular reports on performance.

Video Editing
- Edit basic video content for Instagram posts and stories.
- Ensure all videos are optimized for Instagram’s format and guidelines.

Content Creation
- Design and create visually appealing carousel posts (I have a template)
- Develop high-quality images and graphics for Instagram.

Copywriting
- Write compelling captions and posts that resonate with the target audience, for posts that are faceless reels
- Assist in creating content for Instagram ads and promotions.

Advertising
- Set up and manage awareness ad campaigns on Instagram.
- Monitor ad performance and adjust strategies as needed to maximize engagement and reach.

Other Responsibilities
-Conduct research to stay updated on the latest Instagram trends and best practices.
Assist with other marketing tasks as needed.

This will be a 10hr job per week and will scale to potentially a part-time over the summer



Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:58 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Content Creation, Health & Wellness, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Content Writing, Administrative Support, Film Editing
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Content Creation, Health & Wellness, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Content Writing, Administrative Support, Film Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:
Description: We are looking for female UGC creators for our oral care brand

About the Opportunity:
Are you a female short form video creator interested in working with a top oral care brand (with an established social following)? We are looking for multiple creators to create content that drives sales!

What You'll Do:
Work with our internal team of marketers and other creators to create content that resonates with our ideal customer.

Bonus Points if You Are:
-Above 45 years old
-A sister due
-Couple team
-Bilingual

Scripts, hooks, video inspiration to be provided but we welcome all creators to be creative and work on their own ideas.

Send your portfolio and rates in the DMs.
Looking for 10-15 videos per month.
Hourly Rate: Will discuss

item.title: Video Editing - Motion Tracking / Special Effects - Upwork
item.description:
Job Overview:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor. This job involves creating a high-quality video showcasing a commercial property in Atlanta. The ideal candidate will have experience in various aspects of video production, including editing, coloring, and motion tracking.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit and color a 45-second to 1-minute video, highlighting the new development.
- Incorporate interior shots of suites and exterior orbiting shots featuring key landmarks. (footage provided through Dropbox)
- Apply special effects such as callouts and motion tracking shots.
- Collaborate with the team to meet specific video requirements.
- Ensure the final product aligns with the client's vision and expectations.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in video editing and post-production.
- Proficiency in video editing software and techniques.
- Strong attention to detail and a creative eye.
- Ability to work under tight deadlines.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States

item.title: Video Creator for Trivia Content on Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator to produce short videos for our YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram reels. The videos will consist of trivia questions and should be engaging and visually appealing. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and storytelling. This is an ongoing project with a requirement of 5-8 trivia questions per video and 1-5 videos per day. The videos should be concise and entertaining, capturing the attention of our target audience. If you have a passion for creating compelling content and can deliver high-quality videos on a regular basis, we would love to hear from you!

Skills required:
- Video editing
-Access to B-roll images
- Storytelling
- Content creation
- Attention to detail (especially grammar and spelling)
-Experience with AI for trivia question research, selection, and AI voiceover

The goal is to create 1-5 videos per day. The more videos, the better. Each video is estimated to take around 30 minutes to create. Will pay $5 per video. The goal is for full time and long-term employment.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Content Writing, Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Content, AI Audio Generation
Skills: Content Writing, Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Content, AI Audio Generation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: ASMR Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented ASMR Video Creator to produce calming and visually appealing videos for our YouTube and TikTok channels. The ideal candidate will be skilled in recording ASMR videos and editing them to create 25-second videos. This role requires a keen eye for detail, creativity, and the ability to create a relaxing atmosphere through audio and visual cues.
    Responsibilities:
    - Use markers to color cute pictures (Kawaii and other cute style coloring books can be provided or reimbursed. Alcohol markers preferred and can be provided or reimbursed)
    - Edit videos to last approximately 25 seconds
    - Ensure videos have a soothing and ASMR-inducing effect
    - Implement audio and visual cues to enhance the viewer's experience
    - Collaborate with the content team to brainstorm and develop video concepts
    - Deliver high-quality videos within the given timeframe
    
    Requirements:
    - Experience in video editing, specifically creating ASMR content
    - Knowledge of ASMR triggers and techniques
    - Familiarity with YouTube and TikTok platforms
    - Attention to detail and ability to create visually appealing videos
    
    If you have a passion for ASMR and possess the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work when applying.
Coloring and editing each video takes about 30 minutes. Will offer $6 for 2 videos.
We would love to work toward full time and long-term employment. Make as many videos as you can, but the goal is to post a minimum of two short videos per day.

Budget: $6
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Platforms - Upwork
item.description:
I am a realtor focused on real estate and community engagement, strongly emphasizing generating leads through engaging video content. My target platforms include YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook. I am seeking a talented video editor to help create compelling videos that drive engagement and attract new clients. I currently utilize CapCut and Canva for editing, and my video footage is captured either via Zoom or an iPhone camera.

What I Want:

**Edit and produce high-quality videos for YouTube, ensuring they can be repurposed for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook posts.

**Be able to edit videos recorded via iPhone and Zoom.
Incorporate text overlays, b-roll from my footage, and stock video/photos as needed.

**Ensure videos are engaging, visually appealing, and aligned with my brand’s tone and style.

**Collaborate with me to brainstorm and execute creative ideas for video content.
As part of the vetting process, please provide a test edit of one of my currently published videos to demonstrate your skills.

Requirements:

**Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio of work demonstrating proficiency in editing for YouTube and other social media platforms.

**Proficient in CapCut (or your editor of choice) and Canva.
Strong understanding of video editing principles, including pacing, storytelling, and visual aesthetics.

**Ability to incorporate text overlays and b-roll seamlessly.
Experience editing videos recorded on iPhone and Zoom.

**Creative mindset with the ability to come up with innovative video ideas.

**Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.

**Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.




Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Lemon Reels Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to edit and produce 60-second reels showcasing unconventional and entertaining things to do with a Lemon. Yes, a Lemon! The videos should be engaging, creative, and visually appealing to captivate the audience. As the video editor, you will be responsible for selecting the best footage, adding suitable music and sound effects, and ensuring seamless transitions. Strong storytelling and editing skills are essential to create compelling visuals that capture the imagination. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial. If you have a passion for creating unique content and can turn a Lemon into a source of entertainment, we want to hear from you!

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

Category: Voice Talent

item.title: YouTube Expert & Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to help me strategize, build & grow a new YouTube Channel that I have created for my personal brand as an Energy Healer.

Job requirements:

- Video editing
- Creating thumbnails & other graphics
- Channel management
- Channel growth
- Youtube strategy

This position will start small, and depending on how you do, can grow infinitely as the channel grows.

If it's also within your skill set, there is also potential to expand into more of a personal assistant position that would also involve email support & response, graphic creation for other projects, facebook group management, customer support and more.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$45.00

item.title: Iphone Videographer in Puerto Rico - Upwork
item.description:
Video Testimonial at a Restaurant Location- Puerto Rico

We're looking for a talented videographer to join us on a short-term assignment in Puerto Rico

Key Responsibilities:
Capture Customer Experiences: Your primary task will be to film customers engaging with our products, showcasing real-life interactions that highlight the value and benefits of our offerings.

Behind-the-Scenes Footage: We want to give viewers a glimpse into the inner workings of our client's business. Your role will involve capturing engaging B-roll footage of the back-of-house operations and the bustling atmosphere of the restaurant.

Conduct Owner Interview: You'll have the opportunity to sit down with the owner for an interview. We'll provide you with a set of questions to ask, but we also encourage you to bring your own creativity and insight to the conversation.

Requirements:

Excellent Communication Skills: As our liaison with the client, you'll need to be friendly, professional, and proactive in coordinating the shoot. Clear and open communication will be key to ensuring a successful collaboration.

Attention to Detail: We have specific shots and scenes in mind, so a keen eye for detail will be essential in capturing the footage we need to tell our story effectively.

Flexibility and Adaptability: Schedules may shift, unexpected challenges may arise—your ability to adapt to changing circumstances with grace and professionalism will be invaluable.

Please note********** We will only require raw footages. You can use your iPhone to conduct the shoot. Make sure audio is clear when capturing the interview. We will provide you the questions for the interview and video shots we require.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography
Skills: Videography
Country: United States
click to apply
